{{cpp/experimental/title|swap&lt;small&gt;(std::experimental::function)&lt;/small&gt;}}
{{cpp/experimental/lib extensions/pmr/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|
template&lt; class R, class... Args &gt;
void swap( std::experimental::function&lt;R(Args...)&gt; &amp;lhs,
           std::experimental::function&lt;R(Args...)&gt; &amp;rhs );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Overloads the {{tt|swap}} algorithm for {{lc|std::experimental::function}}. Exchanges the state of {{c|lhs}} with that of {{c|rhs}}. Effectively calls {{c|lhs.swap(rhs)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|polymorphic function wrappers whose states to swap}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
